title: Any item cannot be selected on the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select the item on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
Expected Behavior: The label item should be able to be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Notice that the label item cannot be selected.
4. Select the label item again and observe that it can now be selected.
